articles.title: How a fast-moving $50 cash relief program buoyed needy families when SNAP payments were paused
articles.mainIdea: How a fast-moving $50 cash relief program buoyed needy families when SNAP payments were paused
articles.summary: Associated Press Finance: How a fast-moving $50 cash relief program buoyed needy families when SNAP payments were paused. Finances already looked tight for Jade Grant and her three children as she entered the year's final months. “Everyone’s birthday is back-to-back,” the 32-year-old certified nursing assistant said. Grant is among the nearly 42 million lower-income Americans who get help buying groceries from the Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program, or SNAP.
